wRDaBA.en:
[Laertes]
Hmm, maybe you should fight more Porings first.
You're a little too weak to help me.
wRDaBA.pt:

wxDaBA.en:
[Laertes]
I work for an apothecary in Prontera
Recently, Creamys have been contaminating our medical supplies with their Butterfly Powder.
wxDaBA.pt:
[Laertes]
I work for an apothecary in Prontera
Recently, Creamys have been contaminating our medical supplies with their Butterfly Powder.

xBDaBA.en:
[Laertes]
You seem strong.
Would you mind helping me out with something?
Could you get rid of some of those Creamys for me?
I will make sure you get a reward when you are done.
xBDaBA.pt:
[Laertes]
You seem strong.
Would you mind helping me out with something?
Could you get rid of some of those Creamys for me?
I will make sure you get a reward when you are done.

xxDaBA.en:
[Laertes]
Thank you.
How many Creamys would you like to hunt?
xxDaBA.pt:
[Laertes]
Thank you.
How many Creamys would you like to hunt?

yxDaBA.en:
